query:
SELECT
                source_id as "source_id!",
                MIN(discovered_at) as "first_discovered: String",
                MAX(fetched_at) as "last_fetched: String",
                MIN(CASE WHEN status IN ('discovered', 'fetching')
                    THEN discovered_at END) as "oldest_pending: String"
               FROM crawl_urls
               GROUP BY source_id
